attributes.action: We want to see Marcas Rashford given a knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: The last 18 months have been hard for many family's across the UK and one person who has made life much brighter for many would be Marcas Rashford. Rashford has helped massively in rasing £20 million pounds for his free school meals campaign. His work has been incredibly beneficial over the last 18 months due to many thousands of family's struggling due to the lock down and their circumstances. Due to Rashfords incredible work and heroic he deserves a Knighthood.
attributes.background: I would like the government to consider Giving Marcas Rashford a knighthood. For all of his incredible work and help for those struggling due to their unfortunate circumstances. We believe thag it is the government's responsibility to reward Rashford for his incredible actions.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
